snippet: In “All Gone” Alex Witchel writes about her mother’s dementia (with recipes), and in “The End of Your Life Book Club” Will Schwalbe describes what he and his mother read as she was dying of cancer.
abstract: Rachel Shteir reviews books All Gone: A Memoir of My Mother's Dementia. With Refreshments by Alex Witchel and The End of Your Life Book Club by Will Schwalbe.
lead_paragraph: In “All Gone” Alex Witchel writes about her mother’s dementia (with recipes), and in “The End of Your Life Book Club” Will Schwalbe describes what he and his mother read as she was dying of cancer.

headline.seo: ‘All Gone’ and ‘The End of Your Life Book Club’
headline.main: Homages to Mom, With a Pinch of Sentiment and Literary Side Dishes
headline.print_headline: Homages to Mom, With a Pinch of Sentiment and Literary Side Dishes
